Articles.Content:
Tembaco proudly presents the **Vogelspin**

'Vogelspin' means tarantula in dutch. But it can also be translated as 'Bird Spider'. Hence I choose the name, as this plane is a spider. A flying spider that is. 

> ![20puiph.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/20puiph.png)
> ![2n7fq0m.png](http://i46.tinypic.com/2n7fq0m.png)
> 
> ![35mjsdh.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/35mjsdh.png)

Yes it is capable of flight, not the best plane but then again, it\'s a spider.

I respect you for having build a flying spider. It must not work very well.

> 
> But then again, it\'s a spider.

It flies better then one would suspect, and with 1200kg of fuel it\'s capable of reaching the northpole with ease. I\'d say try it.

> ![okmmu0.png](http://i50.tinypic.com/okmmu0.png)
